mean_cn: adj.忧虑的，不安的，敏悟的，知晓的
mean_en: afraid that something bad or unpleasant is going to happen: feeling or showing fear or apprehension about the future
sentence: He is very apprehensive about the falling value of his stocks and shares.
sentence_trans: 他对股价的持续走低感到很忧虑。
word_etyma: apprehen(d)理解 + sive形容词后缀：有…性质的 → apprehensive 有理解力的，忧虑的
